title: Harden Polly against prompt leakage and enforce independent thinking
author: Itachi-1824

gist.summary: Polly's core logic has been upgraded to provide robust protection against prompt injection while enabling a more authentic, independent personality.
gist.impact: Users will notice more natural conversations where Polly thoughtfully evaluates requests and maintains better security boundaries.
